comments.body: We are not enforcing nor it is required but it would be nice to use the SPDX strings for consistence. In this case it would be `GPL-3.0`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +61,65 @@about:
  home: https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/
  license: GPLv3
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE

comments.body: While I'm a fan of multi-line scripts this is marginally too complex and probably deserve its own `build.sh`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@    export PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib64/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/pkgconfig:${PKG_CONFIG_PATH}"
    export CFLAGS="${CFLAGS} -I ${PREFIX}/include/freetype2 -I ${PREFIX}/include/harfbuzz"
    {{ PYTHON }} setup.py linux-package --prefix=$PREFIX --update-check-interval=0
  skip: True  # [win or py2k or osx]
  ignore_run_exports:
